summary: Comprehensive testing of Askillax Digital Marketing Academy website completed. Fixed multiple branding issues (Skillax → Askillax), updated year references (2025 → 2026), and updated certification counts (25+ → 30+). All 19 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified across all pages.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint working (19/19 pytest tests passed)
Home page shows 'Askillax' branding and '30+ AI Tools' headline
Home page AI search demo shows '2026' and 'Askillax Academy'
Navigation includes all pages: Home, About, Courses, Certifications, AI & Tools, Careers, Blog, Contact
About page shows Kerala Digital Landscape with Kochi, Trivandrum, Kozhikode, Wayanad locations
About page shows 30+ AI tools grid (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, ManyChat, Zoho, GitHub Copilot)
About page timeline shows IT company journey from 2020
Certifications page shows 30+ certifications with scrolling marquee
AI & Tools page shows 30+ tools including Askillax proprietary tools
AI & Tools page shows SEO/AEO/GEO section
Careers page does NOT show salary amounts (no /month displays)
Careers page has career paths and career guidance modal
Contact page shows 'March 2026 Batch' and '30+ Certifications'
Chatbot shows 'Askillax AI' branding and 30+ certifications/tools
Footer shows Askillax branding and updated links
seed_data_creation: Test leads created via pytest with TEST_ prefix for identification
context_for_next_testing_agent: All branding updated from Skillax to Askillax. Year references updated from 2025 to 2026. Certification counts updated from 25+ to 30+. All pages verified: Home, About, Courses, Certifications, AI & Tools, Careers, Blog, Contact. Chatbot header now shows 'Askillax AI'. Contact page shows correct email 'contact@askillax.in'. Kerala Digital Landscape shows 4 locations with Wayanad as 'OUR BASE'. No salary amounts displayed on Careers page.
fixes_applied: Chatbot.js: Changed 'Skillax AI' to 'Askillax AI' in header
Chatbot.js: Updated 'March 2025' to 'March 2026' in multiple responses
Chatbot.js: Changed email domain from skillax.in to askillax.in
Contact.js: Updated 'March 2025' to 'March 2026' in all references
Contact.js: Changed email from skillax.in to askillax.in
Contact.js: Updated WhatsApp message to use Askillax
Courses.js: Updated '25+' to '30+' certifications and AI tools
Blog.js: Updated blog dates from 2025 to 2026
Blog.js: Changed author from 'Skillax Team' to 'Askillax Team'
WhatsAppButton.js: Changed message to use 'Askillax Academy'
